seo: Atlassian Confluence,代码执行漏洞,CVE-2023-22527,模板注入
summary: 该插件用于检测Atlassian Confluence中的text-inline.vm模板注入导致的代码执行漏洞，攻击者可利用此漏洞远程执行代码并控制目标系统。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the code execution vulnerability caused by text-inline.vm template injection in Atlassian Confluence. Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to remotely execute code and control the target system.
